title: Claiming Lives
description: Adapted from my award-winning screenplay of the same name, CLAIMING LIVES, is a crime thriller about Jake Smithson, a San Francisco homicide inspector who still suffers nightmares from his youth when his teenage girlfriend was taken by a serial kidnapper. Now, his nightmares again become a reality in a brutal cat and mouse game when the kidnapper reemerges with a vicious vendetta, tormenting Jake by leaving naked dead women as clues. When Jake finally saves one of the women from a bizarre death, everyone close to him, including his partner and adolescent daughter, become targets of the incensed killer. Jake not only has to defend against the threat of this deranged madman and fight the debilitating influences of his past, but also must come to grips with the overpowering feelings heâ€™s developing for the mysterious woman he saved.
author: Stuart Land
